children.text: Welcome to Quizzario! This Privacy Policy describes how Quizzario Pvt Ltd ("we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, and shares information when you use our mobile application/website. This policy applies to the information collected through the App and covers our practices regarding the permissions requested by the App, as well as our commitment to user privacy and data protection.
By using the App, you agree to the terms and conditions of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, please do not use the App.

Information We Collect
1.1 Personal Information
We may collect certain personal information when you use the online payment facility within the App. This may include your name, email address, billing address, and payment card details. We collect this information to process your payments securely and provide you with the requested products or services. We do not store your payment card details on our servers.

1.2 Permissions
In addition to the personal information collected for online payments, we may also request the following permissions from you:

1.2.1 Notifications
We may request permission to send you notifications to keep you updated with the latest quizzes, learning materials, and promotions. You have the option to enable or disable these notifications at any time in your device settings.

1.2.2 Location
We may request permission to access your device's location to offer location-based quizzes, recommendations, and personalized content. This information is used solely within the App and is not shared with any third parties.

1.2.3 Media Files
We may request permission to access your media files, such as photos and videos, to enable features like uploading images for quizzes or learning purposes. Your media files are not shared with any third parties without your explicit consent.

1.2.4 Phone Contacts
We may request permission to access your phone contacts to provide you with a more social and interactive experience within the App. This permission lets you connect with friends and share quizzes or learning materials. Your phone contacts are not shared with any third parties without your explicit consent.

Use of Information
2.1 Personal Information for Online Payments
We use the personal information collected for online payments to process your transactions securely and provide you with the requested products or services. We may also use this information to communicate with you regarding your payments, send receipts, and provide customer support.

2.2 Notifications
If you grant us permission to send you notifications, we may use this feature to provide you with relevant updates, new quizzes, learning materials, and promotional offers.

2.3 Location
If you grant us permission to access your location, we may use this information to provide you with location-based quizzes, recommendations, and personalized content.

2.4 Media Files
If you grant us permission to access your media files, we may use this feature to enable you to upload images for quizzes or learning purposes within the App.

2.5 Phone Contacts
If you grant us permission to access your phone contacts, we may use this feature to enhance your social experience within the App, allowing you to connect with your friends, and share quizzes, and learning materials.

Data Sharing
We do not share your personal information collected for online payments with third parties unless required by law or with your explicit consent. We may share aggregated and anonymized data with third parties for analytical purposes, market research, or improving the App's functionality. These third parties are bound by confidentiality obligations and are not permitted to use the information for any other purpose.

Data Security
We take reasonable measures to protect the information collected through the App from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. We implement industry-standard security measures to safeguard your personal information during transmission and storage. However, please note that no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data.

Children's Privacy
The App is suitable for both kids and adults. If you are under the age of 13, please seek parental consent before using the online payment facility within the App. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children without parental consent. If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected personal information from a child under the age of 13 without proper consent, we will take steps to delete such information from our records.

Changes to the Privacy Policy
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be effective upon posting the revised policy in the App. We encourage you to periodically review this page for the latest information on our privacy practices.

Contact Us
If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at [info@quizzarioglobal.com].
By using the App, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy and consent to collect, and use your information as described herein.
Thank you for using Quizzario!
